column1: COUNSEL : Dr. Asanga Gunawansa with Dilshan Jayasooriya,
Shenella Fonseka and Devaka Jayasooriya instructed by
Vidanapathirana Associates for the Petitioner – Appellant.
Viran Corea with Thilini Vidanagamage instructed by
Himalee Kularathne with Jayani Perera for the 3rd to 8th
Kanishka De Silva, D.S.G. for the 9th to 14th Respondents.
This is an appeal filed under the Right to Information Act No. 12 of 2016.
The 1st and 2nd appellant–respondents had filed a request for information
in terms of the Right to Information Act (hereinafter referred to as RTI Act)
